newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Evergreen unit to issue T$1.4 bln bonds.
newsitem.headline: Evergreen unit to issue T$1.4 bln bonds.

text.p: Gloria Heavy Industrial Corp, a member of Taiwan shipping giant Evergreen Marine group, said on Monday it would issue T$1.4 billion in secured corporate bonds in late November to raise operating funds.
"We do plan to issue T$1.4 billion in unsecured corporate bonds in late November," a Gloria spokeswoman told Reuters.
The five-year bonds will bear a semiannual interest rate of 6.45 percent, equivalent to 6.554 percent per year, she said.
Gloria is an unlisted maker of stainless steel products.
